Headline: Get $150 off refurb Bose QuietComfort 35 II noise-canceling headphones at eBay
Article_Body: If you're working from home and need to block out some of the sounds around the house, you need a solid pair of noise-canceling headphones. And now is a great time to buy, since factory-renewed Bose QuietComfort 35 II headphones are just under $200 on eBay.  Factory-Renewed Bose QuietComfort 35 II ($199.95, originally $349.95; ebay.com). A $150 discount is major for this in-demand model. Yes, they're refurbished, but the renewal process is handled by Bose, which guarantees thorough testing and quality standards. Plus, you'll get the same warranty on this refurbished pair as you would with a new pair. The Bose QuietComfort 35 II are active noise-canceling Bluetooth headphones. So not only do they tune out ambient distractions, but their high-quality sound will also immerse you in your music and allow you to take calls clearly. Not to mention, they're ultra comfortable, and at 20 hours of battery life — and 2.5 hours of battery from a 15-minute charge — you can keep the music going all day. These cans also integrate both Alexa and Google Assistant. Choose your preferred assistant and start making calls, setting alarms, checking the weather and more. But hear us out: This deal might not last much longer, so shop soon. For more great Bose deals, check out CNN Coupons.  Note: The prices above reflect the retailer's listed price at the time of publication.
